title: Scripts DB sync + manifest for trigger folder/orchestrator scripts
description: Created Scripts DB entries for trigger_folder_orchestrator.py and trigger_file_processor.py, added scripts_manifest.json, and audited Agent-Trigger folder structure.
required_action: Review new Scripts DB pages, confirm relations/status, and keep orchestrator runtime tokenized. If more properties/relations are required, update entries and rerun manifest.
success_criteria: Scripts entries verified, manifest accepted, and any further schema links added if needed.

notes: Root files include .orchestrator_state.json and orchestrator_logs/ for watch state/logs.
